member.name: T:Xunit.Extensions.Ordering.IAssemblyFixture`1
member.summary: Interface do decorate you test classes to register assembly level fixture.

member.name: T:Xunit.Extensions.Ordering.OrderAttribute
member.summary: Decorate you test collections, test classes and test cases with this attribute to order test execution. Tests are executed in ascending order. If no `Order` attribute is specified default 0 is assigned. If multiple at same level have same value their execution order against each other is deterministic but unpredictible.

member.name: M:Xunit.Extensions.Ordering.OrderAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: Order index to order test collections, test classes and test cases. Tests are executed in ascending order.
